title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 11 categories on the x axis representing Country, and Index value in each Country on the y axis.
The highest category is found at United States where Index value is 152.0.
The lowest category is found at India where Index value is 10.0.
The highest value at United States is almost 15.2 times larger than the minimum value of India.
